ygData.subject: Firewater
ygData.msgSnippet: I emailed the guy doing the coding for skills and he replayed that the first thing you learn as a Tinker is making Firewater. That s like skewers for smiths.
ygData.messageBody:
I emailed the guy doing the coding for skills
and he replayed that the first thing you learn
as a Tinker is making Firewater. That's like
skewers for smiths. He also said it's in the
game. Ok, is it me or have I seen NOTHING
that tells me how to make Firewater?

But I can't test what I think it might be, so
I'm posting my idea out there and maybe someone
can try it and post the results, I'm going to
a wedding, so I can't try it myself(yet).

My idea is combine a Flask of Water (Real not
summoned) with Firebeetle Eye. The eye seems to
be used in a lot of things, it's a light source
and it's another spell, so try those two in
the tool box, maybe (hope of hopes) my 2am
revelation is right.


-Zikkin


p.s. Anyone make anything at all?
I'm going to try compasses (I found someone
that specializes in Pie Tins, who would have
thought) and they are all that expensive, I'm
paying him 6gp/tin. Think I'll buy 10-20, and
start making compasses.
